scripts.lint: npm run -s lint:scripts && npm run -s lint:styles
scripts.generate-free-plugin: cp -R build/notifier-pro build/notifier; mv build/notifier/notifier-pro.php build/notifier/notifier.php; sed -i '' 's/WA Notifier Pro/WA Notifier/g' build/notifier/notifier.php; sed -i '' 's/WA Notifier Pro/WA Notifier/g' build/notifier/includes/classes/class-notifier-dashboard.php
scripts.strip-free-code: export LC_ALL=C; find build/notifier/ -type f -exec sed -i '' '/==Notifier_Pro_Code_Start==/,/==Notifier_Pro_Code_End==/d' {} +; find build/notifier/ -type f -exec sed -i '' '/==Notifier_Pro_Code/d' {} +; find build/notifier/ -type f -exec sed -i '' '/==Notifier_Free_Code/d' {} +;
scripts.strip-pro-code: export LC_ALL=C; find build/notifier-pro/ -type f -exec sed -i '' '/==Notifier_Free_Code_Start==/,/==Notifier_Free_Code_End==/d' {} +; find build/notifier-pro/ -type f -exec sed -i '' '/==Notifier_Pro_Code/d' {} +; find build/notifier-pro/ -type f -exec sed -i '' '/==Notifier_Free_Code/d' {} +;
scripts.zip: zip -r build/notifier.zip build/notifier; zip -r build/notifier-pro.zip build/notifier-pro
scripts.deploy: yarn build; rm -r build/*; yarn generate-pro-plugin; yarn generate-free-plugin; yarn strip-free-code; yarn strip-pro-code; yarn zip; yarn copy-to-free-site; yarn copy-to-pro-site;
